meanings.definition: A person who makes a promise.
meanings.sent1: The promisors assured us they would finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The promisors at the company always keep their word.
meanings.sent3: The promisors joked that they would move mountains to keep their promise.
meanings.sent4: The promisors were like beacons of trust in a sea of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The image of the promisors standing tall stayed with us long after the meeting.

meanings.definition: Those who commit to fulfilling an obligation.
meanings.sent1: We rely on the promisors to deliver the goods as agreed.
meanings.sent2: The promisors take their commitments seriously and never back down.
meanings.sent3: The promisors playfully bet that they could complete the task blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: The promisors were the pillars of reliability in the organization.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the promisors' dedication lingered in our minds.
